name_localized.en: Suite, 1 King Bed with Sofa bed, Refrigerator
name_localized.es: Suite, 1 King Bed with Sofa bed, Refrigerator

short_description_localized.en: Suite, 1 King Bed with Sofa bed, Refrigerator
short_description_localized.es: Suite, 1 King Bed with Sofa bed, Refrigerator

description_localized.en:
1 King Bed and 1 Queen Sofa Bed
Internet - Free WiFi and wired Internet access
Entertainment - Flat-screen TV, cable channels, and iPod dock
Food & Drink - Coffee/tea maker and refrigerator (on request)
Sleep - Hypo-allergenic bedding
Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower/tub combination, free toiletries, and a hair dryer
Practical - Free local calls, double sofa bed, and safe; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request
Comfort - Daily housekeeping
Non-Smoking
Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability
